componentList.name: LyTabLabel
componentList.inputs:
[
  "bg",
  "color",
  "raised",
  "disabled",
  "outlined",
  "elevation",
  "shadowColor",
  "disableRipple"
]

componentList.name: LyTabs
componentList.inputs:
[
  "bg",
  "elevation",
  "shadowColor"
]

typeAliasList.name: AlignTabs
typeAliasList.children: type AlignTabs = 'start' | 'center' | 'end' | 'stretch' | 'baseline'

typeAliasList.name: LyTabsHeaderPlacement
typeAliasList.children: type LyTabsHeaderPlacement = 'before' | 'after' | 'above' | 'below'

variableList.name: DEFAULT_BG
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_BG = "primary"

variableList.name: DEFAULT_DISABLE_RIPPLE
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_DISABLE_RIPPLE = false

variableList.name: DEFAULT_ELEVATION
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_ELEVATION = 4

variableList.name: DEFAULT_HEADER_PLACEMENT
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_HEADER_PLACEMENT = "above"

variableList.name: DEFAULT_INDICATOR_COLOR
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_INDICATOR_COLOR = "accent"

variableList.name: STYLE_PRIORITY
variableList.children: const STYLE_PRIORITY = -2

injectableList.name: LyTabsClassesService
injectableList.children:
@Injectable({
  providedIn: 'root'
})
class LyTabsClassesService {
  
}

ngModuleList.name: LyTabsModule
ngModuleList.children: import { LyTabsModule } from '@alyle/ui/tabs'
